sentences.en: Barclays Premiership, Saturday March 31 sth 2006 Vicarage Road, Watford, Herts.
sentences.cn: 英格兰超级联赛, 2006年三月三十一日(星期六),维卡拉格路, 沃特福德, 赫特福德.

sentences.en: I'll now call at the vicarage and report to you in due course.
sentences.cn: 我现在要去教区牧师家拜访，然后适时向你汇报情况。

sentences.en: I'm going to the vicarage to borrow from the poor box.
sentences.cn: 我去牧师那里从那个捐款箱里借.

sentences.en: She always called at the vicarage whenever she was in the area.
sentences.cn: 只要她在那一带，她总会去拜访教区牧师。

sentences.en: The large, redbrick vicarage was built in the days of more fecund clergy.
sentences.cn: 那幢牧师住的红砖大屋是个多子女的牧师在职时修建的.

sentences.en: The whole of their drive to the Vicarage was spent by him in expressing his discontent.
sentences.cn: 他们坐马车到牧师住宅的整个路程,完全消磨在发泄他的不满上面.

words.tran_cn: 代理的；教区牧师的；代理教区牧师职务的
教区牧师，教堂牧师；传教牧师；代理人

trans.tran_cn: 教区牧师的俸禄（住宅，职位）
trans.tran_en: a house where a vicar lives
